org.beanfabrics.swing.table
Class BnColumn

java.lang.Object
  org.beanfabrics.swing.table.BnColumn

public class BnColumn
extends java.lang.Object

The BnColumn is a configuration object used in a BnTable to configure a column.

Author:
Michael Karneim
